objectives: Unload the cargo carried by the east-bound convoy at Malta. Unload the cargo carried by the west-bound convoy at Malta.

scenarioShip.title: Deliver Cargo to Malta from Cruisers
scenarioShip.description: Unload cargo from the cruiser at the port of Malta

scenarioShip.title: Deliver Cargo to Malta from Transports
scenarioShip.description: Unload cargo from the transports at the port of Malta
